name: ProcessHacker Privilege Elevation
description: Detects a ProcessHacker tool that elevated privileges to a very high level
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:ProcessHacker* AND user.name:LocalSystem)`
